title: Dialogos Course Q & A
description:
John Vervaeke & Guy Sengstock discuss the dialogos course.

Link to website for course application etc.:

https://m.facebook.com/events/348220303480355/?acontext=%7B%22ref%22%3A%2252%22%2C%22action_history%22%3A%22%5B%7B%5C%22surface%5C%22%3A%5C%22share_link%5C%22%2C%5C%22mechanism%5C%22%3A%5C%22share_link%5C%22%2C%5C%22extra_data%5C%22%3A%7B%5C%22invite_link_id%5C%22%3A789898041604392%7D%7D%5D%22%7D&refsrc=deprecated&_rdr
